page.title: 14Housing in Springfield
page.content: There are several large{houses}in the village Russell Mill House, Edenfield, The Manse, Station Masters House, Police House and Crawley House in the Main Street_part of the grounds of which have been sold and made into a Nursery_Pennyacre. The houses in Springfield were mainly small single storey cottages_many involved in weaving in the past. Many of the old houses are being converted and modernised. There are some new houses and some new Local Authority Houses. There is one police house for the village policeman. There are villas, terraced houses, bungalows, cottages and semidetached houses.
